numbered_ace_sentences: 1. Men's basketball has about 83% players of color.
2. Women's basketball has about 83% players of color.
3. Men's basketball has about 1/3 coaches of color.
4. Women's basketball has about 1/4 coaches of color.
5. National football has about 74% players of color.
6. National football has about 13% coaches of color.
7. Baseball has less than 50% players of color.
8. Baseball has less than 50% coaches of color.
9. I wonder what these graphs will look like in 10 years.
10. In general, we expect that these numbers will increase.
11. A diverse community is crucial for progress.
12. I wonder what the current status of golf is.
13. I wonder what the current status of tennis is.
14. New Hampshire is one of the whitest states in the country.
15. I live in New Hampshire.
16. My community is affected by this situation.
17. My community tries to increase diversity in sports.
18. My community tries to increase diversity in many activities.
19. It is important that people from all walks of life are involved in the community.
20. If more people from all walks of life are involved, then the community will improve.
21. The title is: The need to overcome adversity, the answer lies in diversity.
